verses.verse: Maschil of David, when he was in the cave; a Prayer. I cry <S%H6963><s%> with my voice <S%H6963><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; With my voice <S%H6963><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> do I make supplication <S%H2603><s%>.
I pour out <S%H8210><s%> my complaint <S%H7879><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H5046><s%>; I show before <S%H6440><s%> him my trouble <S%H6869><s%>.

When my spirit <S%H7307><s%> was overwhelmed <S%H5848><s%> within me <S%H3045><s%>, Thou knewest my path <S%H5410><s%>. In the way <S%H734><s%> wherein <S%H2098><s%> I walk <S%H1980><s%> Have they hidden <S%H2934><s%> a snare for me <S%H6341><s%>.

Look <S%H5027><s%> on my right hand <S%H3225><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%>; For there is no man that knoweth <S%H5234><s%> me <S%H4498><s%>: Refuge hath failed <S%H6><s%> me <S%H1875><s%>; No man careth for my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
I cried <S%H2199><s%> unto thee <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah; I said <S%H559><s%>, Thou art my refuge <S%H4268><s%>, My portion <S%H2506><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>.

Attend <S%H7181><s%> unto my cry <S%H7440><s%>; For I am brought <S%H1809><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> low <S%H1809><s%>: Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from my persecutors <S%H7291><s%>; For they are stronger than I <S%H553><s%>.

Bring <S%H3318><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> out of prison <S%H4525><s%>, That I may give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto thy name <S%H8034><s%>: The righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall compass me about <S%H3803><s%>; For thou wilt deal bountifully with me <S%H1580><s%>.
